name: VagaBond (Zac's Games)
description:
A short personal game about the struggles of having to move to new homes, neighbourhoods ans schools.  

As you move to each new location, scenery and environment are constantly changing as you move between scenes. What should feel normal and comforting is now foreign and bleak. 

People become less interesting and it becomes difficult to make friends knowing you'll be leaving soon and never seeing them again. Your only solace and comfort is when you discover a library after ditching school one day.

_______________________________________________________________________________

Dev Notes:

There is an added lighting effect coming soon that I'm struggling to implement 

Still a WIP. Soon to remove the title screen and menu
